author: Collier Meyerson
title: My Phone Keeps Me Sane During This Crisis … and Insane, Too
description: What happens when the only device that can make you stop crying is exactly the device that is making you cry?
content: In the morning I wake up and turn on my phone. Thirty-eight text messages, mostly jokes and memes about how to keep sane while staying inside, and links to clothes and necklaces my out-of-work friends will buy once were back from quarantine and re-employed. B… [+5387 chars]
